Package info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.controller

Class MainViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.controller.MainViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class MainViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Handles the controller logic associated with the navigation menu in the application and using the selected item to populate the MainView.

      • checkForUpcomingAppointments

        private void checkForUpcomingAppointments()
        Checks to see if the current User has any Appointments starting in the next 15 minutes, and reminds the User of their upcoming schedule. A Lambda is used to perform a quick and readable filter on upcoming Appointments to locate any for the current User.
